title: Fix Test Path Configurations to Match Project Structure
feature: Update test file paths from 'ops/tasks/inbox' to 'ops/jobs/inbox' to match actual project structure
description: Test suite contains incorrect path references (ops/tasks/inbox vs ops/jobs/inbox). Update all test files to use correct directory paths.
context: Test report REQ-001 shows path mismatch preventing agent system tests from executing properly.
result: Successfully updated all documentation and memory files to use correct 'ops/jobs/' path structure instead of 'ops/tasks/'. Test files were already using correct paths.
